name: The Packager (afonsom20) (afonsom20)
description:
In The Packager, you play as a humble worker, trying to deliver packages to make a living. However, your employer seems... strange. You feel as if something was about to go very wrong... 

Try to survive (and, uh, do your job) in a fast-paced frenzy before you get overrun by deranged monsters. 

The game initially made for the Quarantine Jam - the theme was "Pack" - and further expanded upon.

Controls: 

The game is played on PC, with keyboard and mouse: 

  • W-A-S-D or Arrow Keys to move
  • Left Mouse Button to select and shoot
  • 'E' to interact and pick up packages

Endless Mode record: 2948 (by Afonso)

Feel free to contact us (afonsomm@gmail.com) if you beat this score!

MacOS Users:

If you can't run the game, you might need to change permissions. Try running the following commands from the terminal in the folder containing the game, replacing with the path to the application:

cd <PATH>/Packager.app/Contents/MacOS/ chmod a+x Packager.app

If this doesn't work, feel free to contact us (afonsomm@gmail.com).
